item.title: Hugo for Natives
item.description: tl;dr Create an empty GitHub Pages repo e.g. robbiesri/robbiesri.github.io to contain the static generated site. Create an empty git repo to hold the backing Hugo infrastructure This can be also hosted on GitHub ðŸ˜ƒ Install Hugo Use Hugo to initialize a new site, pick a theme, and build some content Peep the Hugo Quick Start guide Initialize the GitHub Pages repo as a submodule in the .
